comment._content: Same group here with several comments. The photo above notes "Mrs. Russell McLennan"--the one linked just gives her last name. All of these are 3 March 1913.

Thanks for the comment.  We will be adding the names of all the women depicted to the source data and then reloading the description to Flickr.
